fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Class RESTRequest<T extends ResourceRepresentation<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.RESTRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The ResourceRepresentation class that request deals with
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RESTRequest<T extends ResourceRepresentation<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holder class for all request stuff. Provides some listener to handle specific logic in Activity when request starts, succeed or failed
    Version:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Listener for RESTRequest failed state
      static interface  RESTRequest.OnFinishedRequestListener
      Listener for RESTRequest finished state
      static interface  RESTRequest.OnStartedRequestListener
      Listener for RESTRequest started state

      • pauseListeners

        public void pauseListeners()
        Pauses the listeners by setting their state to ListenerState.UNSET
        See Also:
        resumeListeners(), mOnFailedRequestListeners, mOnFinishedRequestListeners, mOnStartedRequestListeners

      • resumeListeners

        public boolean resumeListeners()
        Resumes the listeners. If listener state is set to ListenerState.UNSET, state is updated to ListenerState.SET. If the state is ListenerState.TRIGGER_ME the listener is triggered and is state updated to ListenerState.TRIGGERED
        Returns:
        True if listener(s) was triggered, false otherwise
        See Also:
        pauseListeners(), mOnFailedRequestListeners, mOnFinishedRequestListeners, mOnStartedRequestListeners

      • triggerOnStartedRequestListeners

        public boolean triggerOnStartedRequestListeners()
        Triggers RESTRequest.OnStartedRequestListener if state is set to ListenerState.SET and updates state to ListenerState.TRIGGERED. If the listener is unset, state is updated to ListenerState.TRIGGER_ME
        Returns:
        True if a listener was triggered, false otherwise
        See Also:
        mOnStartedRequestListeners

      • triggerOnFinishedRequestListeners

        public boolean triggerOnFinishedRequestListeners()
        Triggers RESTRequest.OnFinishedRequestListener if state is set to ListenerState.SET and updates state to ListenerState.TRIGGERED. If the listener is unset, state is updated to ListenerState.TRIGGER_ME
        Returns:
        True if a listener was triggered, false otherwise
        See Also:
        mOnFinishedRequestListeners

      • triggerOnFailedRequestListeners

        public boolean triggerOnFailedRequestListeners()
        Triggers RESTRequest.OnFailedRequestListener if state is set to ListenerState.SET and updates state to ListenerState.TRIGGERED. If the listener is unset, state is updated to ListenerState.TRIGGER_ME
        Returns:
        True if a listener was triggered, false otherwise
        See Also:
        mOnFailedRequestListeners
